tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE athlete_profiles (
  athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  sport VARCHAR(50),
  goal_description TEXT,
  progress_assessment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AthleteProfiles (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    birthdate DATE,
    height INT,
    weight INT
);

CREATE TABLE ProgressAssessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    weight_progress INT,
    endurance_progress INT,
    strength_progress INT
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    height DECIMAL(4,2),
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    sport VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE athletes (athlete_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name STRING, age INT, height FLOAT, weight FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE profiles (profile_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id UUID REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id), bio STRING, photo_url STRING)
CREATE TABLE goals (goal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, athlete_id UUID REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id), goal_description STRING, deadline DATE)
CREATE TABLE progress (progress_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, goal_id UUID REFERENCES goals(goal_id), progress_update TEXT, date DATE)

CREATE TABLE athlete_profiles (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    firstname VARCHAR(50),
    lastname VARCHAR(50),
    dob DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    goal_description TEXT,
    target_date DATE,
    achieved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE progress_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_result FLOAT,
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE training_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    session_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT,
    trainer_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE personal_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    record_name VARCHAR(50),
    record_value FLOAT,
    record_date DATE
);
